title: Does LUMS have transfer programs to foreign universities? - Quora

response.answer_text: No formal transfer programs. However you can transfer in personal capacity. If you’re talking about exchange programs so yes LUMS has several collaborations. You can also apply for many exchange programs in personal capacity e.g: SUSIUgradAustralian, Indonesian exchange programs etcThe LUMS MBA does offer an exchange program to some students.
Yes it does at present it's partnered with universities like Waseda in Japan where students spend one semester as exchange students
